languages.text: "Глейто никого не засек, вот только шерсть у него стоит дыбом. Не знаю, что происходит, но мы готовы атаковать и незримую цель — только укажите ее позицию".
"Glaito hasn't spotted anyone yet, but I can see his hair is bristling. I don't know what's going on, but we are prepared to attack even an invisible target — just relay its position to us."
languages.original_text: "Глейто никого не засек, вот только шерсть у него стоит дыбом. Не знаю, что происходит, но мы готовы атаковать и незримую цель — только укажите ее позицию".

traits.locale_text: "Glaito hasn't spotted anyone yet, but I can see his hair is bristling. I don't know what's going on, but we are prepared to attack even an invisible target — just relay its position."
"Glaito hasn't spotted anyone yet, but I can see his hair is bristling. I don't know what's going on, but we are prepared to attack even an invisible target — just relay its position."
"Glaito hasn't spotted anyone yet, but I can see his hair is bristling. I don't know what's going on, but we are prepared to attack even an invisible target — just relay its position to us."
"Glaito hasn't spotted anyone yet, but I can see his hair is bristling. I don't know what's going on, but we are prepared to attack even an invisible target — just relay its position to us."
"Glaito hasn't spotted anyone yet, but I can see his hair is bristling. I don't know what's going on, but we are prepared to attack even an invisible target — just relay its position to us."
"Glaito hasn't spotted anyone yet, but I can see his hair is bristling. I don't know what's going on, but we are prepared to attack even an invisible target — just relay its position to us."

languages.text: “格雷托没有看到任何敌人，但我看到它的毛竖起来了。虽然我不知道这是怎么回事，但哪怕是看不见的敌人，我们也一样可以攻击，只要把敌人的位置告诉我们就好。”
languages.original_text: "Glaito hasn't spotted anyone yet, but I can see his hair is bristling. I don't know what's going on, but we are prepared to attack even an invisible target — just relay its position to us."

traits.locale_text: “格雷托没有看到任何敌人，但我看到它的毛竖起来了。虽然我不知道这是怎么回事，但哪怕是看不见的敌人，我们也一样可以攻击，只要把敌人的位置告诉我们就好。”

languages.text: «Glaito no ha avistado a nadie, pero su pelo ya está erizado. No sé lo que sucede, pero podemos atacar a un objetivo invisible. Solo díganos dónde está».
languages.original_text: "Glaito hasn't spotted anyone yet, but I can see his hair is bristling. I don't know what's going on, but we are prepared to attack even an invisible target — just relay its position to us."

traits.locale_text: «Glaito no ha avistado a nadie, pero su pelo ya está erizado. No sé lo que sucede, pero podemos atacar a un objetivo invisible. Solo díganos dónde está».

languages.text: « Glaito n'a encore repéré personne, mais je vois que son poil est dressé. Je ne sais pas ce qu'il se passe, mais nous sommes prêts à attaquer, même si notre cible est invisible. Contentez-vous de nous communiquer ses coordonnées. »
languages.original_text: "Glaito hasn't spotted anyone yet, but I can see his hair is bristling. I don't know what's going on, but we are prepared to attack even an invisible target — just relay its position to us."

traits.locale_text: « Glaito n'a encore repéré personne, mais je vois que son poil est dressé. Je ne sais pas ce qu'il se passe, mais nous sommes prêts à attaquer, même si notre cible est invisible. Contentez-vous de nous communiquer ses coordonnées. »

languages.text: 「グライトはまだ誰も見つけていませんが、毛が逆立っているのがわかります。何が起きているのかは分かりませんが、たとえ相手が見えなくても攻撃する準備はできています。位置さえ教えてくれれば結構です」
languages.original_text: "Glaito hasn't spotted anyone yet, but I can see his hair is bristling. I don't know what's going on, but we are prepared to attack even an invisible target — just relay its position to us."

traits.locale_text: 「グライトはまだ誰も見つけていませんが、毛が逆立っているのがわかります。何が起きているのかは分かりませんが、たとえ相手が見えなくても攻撃する準備はできています。位置さえ教えてくれれば結構です」

languages.text: "Glaito henüz kimseyi fark etmedi ama tüylerinin diken diken olduğunu görüyorum. Ne olup bitiyor bilmiyorum ama görünmez bir hedef olsa bile saldırmaya hazırız. Konumunu bize bildir."
languages.original_text: "Glaito hasn't spotted anyone yet, but I can see his hair is bristling. I don't know what's going on, but we are prepared to attack even an invisible target — just relay its position to us."

traits.locale_text: "Glaito henüz kimseyi fark etmedi ama tüylerinin diken diken olduğunu görüyorum. Ne olup bitiyor bilmiyorum ama görünmez bir hedef olsa bile saldırmaya hazırız. Konumunu bize bildir."

languages.text: "Glaito hat noch niemanden erspäht, aber seine Haare stellen sich auf. Ich weiß nicht, was hier vorgeht, doch wir können sogar ein unsichtbares Ziel angreifen – gebt uns nur seine Position durch."
languages.original_text: "Glaito hasn't spotted anyone yet, but I can see his hair is bristling. I don't know what's going on, but we are prepared to attack even an invisible target — just relay its position to us."

traits.locale_text: "Glaito hat noch niemanden erspäht, aber seine Haare stellen sich auf. Ich weiß nicht, was hier vorgeht, doch wir können sogar ein unsichtbares Ziel angreifen – gebt uns nur seine Position durch."
